snippet: Puppetworks theater in Brooklyn was founded in 1991 by Nicolas Coppola, a lifelong puppeteer. It has been a neighborhood institution ever since.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Puppetworks theater, opened by puppeteer Nicolas Coppola in Park Slope, Brooklyn, in 1991.
lead_paragraph: Puppetworks theater in Brooklyn was founded in 1991 by Nicolas Coppola, a lifelong puppeteer. It has been a neighborhood institution ever since.

headline.seo: Puppetworks in Brooklyn Remains an Institution
